description:
The citizens of Tokyo come together to rebuild, and the wounded begin to heal. The gang reflects on all that was lost and ponders the mysterious fate of Tatsuma.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Historia Złotego Smoka: Płatki wiśni, które nie opadną
Story of the Golden Dragon: Cherry Blossoms That Do Not Fall
第拾夜 宿星編 黄龍之章「散らない桜」
